trans-unit.source: Determines whether an assembly belongs to a code group by testing its strong name.
trans-unit.target: 通过测试程序集的强名称确定该程序集是否属于代码组。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Strong names are well suited to specifying code assemblies to which you give a rich set of powerful permissions.
trans-unit.target: 强名称非常适合于指定向其授予一组丰富的强大的权限的代码程序集。

trans-unit.source: Since strong names are cryptographically verified, attackers cannot impersonate rightful assemblies and use their permissions.
trans-unit.target: 通过密码验证强名称，因为攻击者无法模拟合法的程序集，并使用他们的权限。

trans-unit.source: The strong name public key blob of the software publisher.
trans-unit.target: 软件发行者的强名称公钥 Blob。

trans-unit.source: The simple name section of the strong name.
trans-unit.target: 强名称中的简单名称部分。

trans-unit.source: The version number of the strong name.
trans-unit.target: 强名称的版本号。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> class with the strong name public key blob, name, and version number that determine membership.
trans-unit.target: 用确定成员身份的强名称公钥 Blob、名称和版本号初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Strong names are well suited to specifying code assemblies to which you give a rich set of powerful permissions.
trans-unit.target: 强名称非常适合于指定向其授予一组丰富的强大的权限的代码程序集。

trans-unit.source: Since strong names are cryptographically verified, attackers cannot impersonate rightful assemblies and use their permissions.
trans-unit.target: 通过密码验证强名称，因为攻击者无法模拟合法的程序集，并使用他们的权限。

trans-unit.source: The `name` and `version` parameters are optional.
trans-unit.target: `name`和`version`参数是可选的。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can create a <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition> that checks for <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.PublicKey%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.Name%2A> (but not <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.Version%2A>) by passing `null` into the `version` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以创建<xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition>，用于检查<xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.PublicKey%2A>和<xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.Name%2A>(但不是<xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.Version%2A>) 通过将传递`null`到`version`参数。

trans-unit.source: If `name` is an empty string (""), an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果`name`为空字符串 ("")、<xref:System.ArgumentException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="blob" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="blob" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="name" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="name" /> parameter is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 参数为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Evidence" /> against which to make the test.
trans-unit.target: 进行测试所依据的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Evidence" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的证据是否能满足成员条件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的证据满足成员条件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This membership condition tests only the <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName> evidence object.
trans-unit.target: 此成员资格条件只测试<xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName>证据对象。

trans-unit.source: The membership condition is satisfied if the specified evidence contains a <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName> with the same <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName> (public key, name, and version) as specified by the <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition>.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的证据包含满足成员资格条件<xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName>具有相同<xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName>（公钥、 名称和版本） 所指定的<xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition>。

trans-unit.source: Creates an equivalent copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> 的等效副本。

trans-unit.source: A new, identical copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" />
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> 的相同的新副本。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> 比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" /> from the specified object is equivalent to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" /> contained in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定对象中的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" /> 是否等效于包含在当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" /> from the specified object is equivalent to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" /> contained in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定对象中的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" /> 等效于包含在当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For two <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName> classes to be equal, their name, version, and public key blob must match exactly.
trans-unit.target: 对于两个<xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName>类相等，则其名称、 版本和公钥 blob 必须完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.PublicKey" /> property of the current object or the specified object is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象或指定对象的 <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.PublicKey" /> 属性是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 通过 XML 编码重新构造具有指定状态的安全对象。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: 用于重新构造安全对象的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 通过 XML 编码重新构造具有指定状态的安全对象。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: 用于重新构造安全对象的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" /> context, used to resolve <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> references.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" /> 上下文，它用于解析 <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> 引用。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 通过 XML 编码重新构造具有指定状态的安全对象。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="e" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="e" /> parameter is not a valid membership condition element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 参数不是有效的成员条件元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> 的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> 的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.PublicKey" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.PublicKey" /> 属性为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the simple name of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" /> for which the membership condition tests.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要针对其测试成员条件的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" /> 的简单名称。

trans-unit.source: The simple name of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" /> for which the membership condition tests.
trans-unit.target: 要针对其测试成员条件的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" /> 的简单名称。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set the <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.Name%2A> property to an empty string (""), an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试设置<xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.Name%2A>属性为空字符串 ("")、<xref:System.ArgumentException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 该值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNamePublicKeyBlob" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" /> for which the membership condition tests.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要针对其测试成员条件的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNamePublicKeyBlob" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNamePublicKeyBlob" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" /> for which the membership condition tests.
trans-unit.target: 要针对其测试成员条件的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNamePublicKeyBlob" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" />。

trans-unit.source: A blob is cryptographic information that uniquely specifies the public key of the software publisher.
trans-unit.target: Blob 是唯一指定软件发行者的公钥的加密信息。

trans-unit.source: Blobs differ from certificates in that the blob only has information about the public key; the certificate also includes information that associates a name of the holder with the key, as well as information to verify the certificate.
trans-unit.target: Blob 不同于证书，因为 blob 仅包含公钥; 有关的信息该证书还包括将持有者的名称与该密钥，相关联的信息以及信息来验证的证书。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set the <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.PublicKey" /> to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将 <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition.PublicKey" /> 设置为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a string representation of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> 的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A representation of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> 的表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 创建安全对象及其当前状态的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 创建安全对象及其当前状态的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: 安全对象的 XML 编码，包括任何状态信息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" /> context, which is used to resolve <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> references.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" /> 上下文，它用于解析 <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> 引用。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state with the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" /> 创建安全对象及其当前状态的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: 安全对象的 XML 编码，包括任何状态信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Version" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" /> for which the membership condition tests.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要针对其测试成员条件的 <see cref="T:System.Version" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Version" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" /> for which the membership condition tests.
trans-unit.target: 要针对其测试成员条件的 <see cref="T:System.Version" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" />。
